name: Rajesh Sharma 0002
content: Homepage of Rajesh Sherma HomePage Bio Research Publications Professional Activities Teaching Log in Rajesh Sharma Associate Professor,Software Engineering GroupInstitute of Computer ScienceUniversity of Tartu, Estonia Email: firstname dot lastname at the rate ut dot ee Find me also on: LinkedIn, Twitter, Google Scholar Prospective Students In case you are interested in working with our group as a postdoc or PhD on the following topics, please feel free to send your CV. Topics: Computational Social Science, Social Network (or Media) Analysis -- Misinformation (Rumour, Fake news, etc.), Abusive speech (Hate Speech, Trolling, etc. ), Online Social Movements (Political and social movements)AI Ethics (Biases, Fairness and Explainability in AI). Please also check our Computational Social Science Group website for more information.
